ParameterBlock.Name: channel
ParameterBlock.Description: [0] is mono or left channel, [1] is right channel

IntegerParameter.Name: nbr_taps
IntegerParameter.Description: Number of filter taps Must be an even number (2≤N≤64)

IntegerParameter.Name: input_gain
IntegerParameter.Description: Shift value for the input gain (-32 ≤ INPUT_GAIN ≤ 32)

IntegerParameter.Name: output_gain
IntegerParameter.Description: Shift value for the output gain (-32 ≤ OUTPUT_GAIN ≤ 32)

IntegerParameter.Name: coefficient
IntegerParameter.Description: Coefficients h(1) to h(N), This coefficient value is coded on 16bits length.
